page.description: Return the first element of the collection.
page.discussion: The <COLLECTION>.FIRST() method returns the first Key in a collection.
page.example: dim mycollection as u mycollection.SET("FJ","Fred Jones") mycollection.SET("BB","Bryan Boyd") mycollection.SET("KL","Kim Lee") mycollection.SET("KB","Karen Boyd") mycollection.SET("EL","Erica Loyd") ? mycollection.FIRST() = "FJ"
